articles.description: As iron ore and copper prices surged to record highs last week and Brent crude flirted with $70 a barrel, talk was growing of the prospects for a sustained commodities boom.“Crude oil is up 31 per
articles.content:
As iron ore and copper prices surged to record highs last week and Brent crude flirted with $70 a barrel, talk was growing of the prospects for a sustained commodities boom.
